keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Arrive at Thriller Bark
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates arrive at the mysterious fog-shrouded island ship Thriller Bark, where Brook's shadow was stolen.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the beginning of the Thriller Bark arc and the crew's confrontation with Gecko Moria.

keyEvents.title: Thriller Bark's Origin Revealed
keyEvents.description: Brook reveals that Thriller Bark is an island ship that drifted from the West Blue and is the world's largest ship.
keyEvents.significance: Explains the true nature of Thriller Bark as a mobile island rather than a natural landmass.

description: Thriller Bark is the world's largest ship, an island ship that was originally from the West Blue. It was converted into a pirate ship by Gecko Moria and lurked in the Florian Triangle for years, shrouded in thick fog. The island is home to Moria's zombie army and serves as the base of operations for the Thriller Bark Pirates.

name.japanese: フロリアン・トライアングル

keyEvents.title: Thriller Bark Located in Florian Triangle
keyEvents.description: The crew confirms that Thriller Bark is located within the mysterious Florian Triangle, a region known for disappearances.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the dangerous and mysterious nature of the region where Thriller Bark operates.

description: A mysterious region of the sea known for thick fog and numerous ship disappearances. Thriller Bark has been lurking in this area for years, using the fog as cover for Gecko Moria's operations.

keyEvents.title: Mini Merry II Launched from Soldier Dock
keyEvents.description: Franky reveals the Soldier Dock System Channel 2, launching the Mini Merry II for the first time.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates another feature of the Thousand Sunny's advanced systems.

keyEvents.title: Invisible Attack on the Sunny
keyEvents.description: Absalom uses his invisibility powers to attack the crew members remaining on the Thousand Sunny.
keyEvents.significance: Shows that even the new ship is vulnerable to the threats of Thriller Bark.

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' ship, built by Franky and the Galley-La Company. Features the Soldier Dock System which includes the Mini Merry II in Channel 2.
currentStatus: Active, trapped within Thriller Bark's gates
